JobTitle: US E-Consulting Business Analyst/Business Process Senior Consultant CBO-AMI
JobFullDesc: Application Modernization & Innovation Business Analyst or Business Process - Senior Consultant Are you a talented professional that focuses on the planning, execution, and monitoring of project initiatives? Are you a resourceful problem solver that thrives in the identification and definition of creative, effective technology solutions? As a Business Analyst or Business Process Senior Consultant, you help clients set-up, manage, and operate their most complex projects, define functional requirements for technology solutions, and design and derive transformative approaches for technology systems. Deloitte's Application Modernization & Innovation Practice comprises passionate, like-minded technology enthusiasts who strive to fundamentally transform how our clients deliver value. We focus on key client issues that impacts the core business by driving down the cost of quality and enhancing technology innovation. Each member of our professional team is a strategic thinker, with a passion for helping organizations innovate the way they work. Success is defined in our ability to ask our clients the tough questions, challenge them towards making real, sustainable change and helping them achieve the change, by working with them, side by side. If this sounds like you, keep reading! We are looking for frontrunners with experience in Business Analysis or Business Process roles. Work you'll do As a Senior Consultant you will lead work threads within an engagement team to create software solutions that help our clients solve problems, expand market share, improve operations, and grow their business. You engage in: Project and Program Management Requirements Elicitation and Management Joint Application Design Sessions Being the lead person to interface between the clients and our Deloitte teams Serve as an integrator between business needs and technology solutions, helping to create technology solutions to meet clients' business needs. Developing & reviewing system requirements, designing the solution, redefining the business, presenting the prototype, and leading the testing of our custom technology solutions The team Application Modernization & Innovation At Deloitte Consulting LLP, Deloitte Application Modernization & Innovation consultants leverage the best of innovative technology, people, and delivery approaches to help our clients dream, explore, build, and optimize their future. The AMI practice delivers end-to-end technology solutions to enable and improve our clients' core business operations. AM&I is composed of three different areas- Service Delivery & Business Design, Application Modernization & Migration and Quality Engineering.  Business Analyst and Business Process Senior Consultants are required to have: Strong knowledge of the SDLC Strong knowledge of Agile methodologies with experience working in an Agile environment Experience in requirements planning, functional design, business process modeling and enterprise business analysis and leading these IT streams with clients 7+ years of relevant consulting or industry experience, with 2+ years leading small-to-mid sized teams 4+ years supporting the planning and management of project initiatives in a Project Management Office or similar team environment 4+ years of experience with Requirements Management and Traceability tools such as the IBM Rational suite and HP Quality Center A willingness to travel 50% of the time nationally Must be legally authorized to work in the United States without the need for employer sponsorship, now, or at any time in the future In addition, successful Senior Consultants will have the following preferred background: Experience or testing cloud solutions on Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and/or Google Cloud Platform Knowledge of DevOps, CI methodologies Industry certifications such as CCBA, CBAP in the business analysis are a plus Experience using tools such as ARIS, IBM Requisite Pro or other similar BPM tools Experience working in a collaborative environment Experience leading work planning, monitoring, and reporting Experience conducting interviews and documenting requirements Experience leading design sessions and defining future state processes Ability to work independently and manage multiple assignments Strong oral and written communication skills A Bachelor's Degree in a relevant field with preference in technology or engineering.
